documentation.description: Updates the data lifecycle of the selected data streams.

name.description: A comma-separated list of data streams whose lifecycle will be updated; use `*` to set the lifecycle to all data streams

expand_wildcards.description: Whether wildcard expressions should get expanded to open or closed indices (default: open)

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

body.description: The data lifecycle configuration that consist of the data retention
